text: Albion railway station is located on the North Coast line in Queensland, Australia. It serves the Brisbane suburb of Albion. On 29 November 1999, two extra platforms opened as part of the quadruplication of the line from Bowens Hills to Northgate."Brisbane Citytrain Shortlines" Railway Digest May 1998 page 15"Queensland Update" Railway Digest January 2000 page 13 ==Services== Albion station is served daily by the Airport, Doomben and Shorncliffe lines.
